attributes.action: Potentially privatise the service provided by our MP's.
attributes.additional_details: I think regardless of any political persuasion, many people in this country might agree that MP's self belief that their own financial worth represents a special case, compared to eg doctors, nurses, police firemen etc. An open debate with representatives of the electorate, following on from MP's own deliberations would soon clarify the situation
attributes.background: With their recent pay rises far outstripping those of other civil servants,and the lack of any real or formal qualifications being required to do the job, the opportunity should be taken to investigate whether privatisation might provide better value

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament.
